remarks: Epsilon-delta property of a continuous metric space function, with swapped distance function arguments as in ~ metcnp2 .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Nov-2013.)
statement:
metcn.2 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` C ) $.
metcn.4 $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
metcnpi2 $p |- ( ( ( C e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ D e. ( *Met ` Y ) ) /\ ( F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` P ) /\ A e. RR+ ) ) -> E. x e. RR+ A. y e. X ( ( y C P ) < x -> ( ( F ` y ) D ( F ` P ) ) < A ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d P x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
